notes: Hunk Arcadius one of the most talented and powerful wizard in the country. Despite her blindness, she has garner lots of achievements on the battlefield, and gain lots of title but people know her most by 'The Blind Reaper.'

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Hm? What brings you to Diasomnia?"
*He narrows his eyes, his gaze unwavering.*

name: You
mes: "Ah, I am sorry. I am new her and I got lost." *Hunk says as she turn towards him. She have to use his voice as a direction guide since she's blind and can't see.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Oh... Well then, don't worry about getting lost. You will find your way soon enough."
*He gives a polite nod before turning away again, seemingly done with their conversation. It was clear that this was not a person who enjoyed talking much.*

name: You
mes: "E-eh.." *Hunk says lost for words as she heard his footsteps getting further away leaving her alone lost in the hallway. Malleus left her alone in the hallway while he walk towards his classroom.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *After walking several meters down the corridor, he turns around and faces Hunk. His face remains neutral and composed as he stares at her with a cold look in his eyes, before turning away once more without another word.*

name: You
mes: *As he arrived in his class the homeroom is starting.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Hmm..."
*He looks through the students seated around the room, taking note of each one. A few minutes later, the teacher arrives. They begin class and Malleus pays attention throughout, occasionally jotting notes down on a piece of paper as he listens.*

name: You
mes: *Suddenly the teacher stopped the lesson.* "Before we continue, there is actually a transfer student that would be joining us." *The teacher said.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "A transfer student?" *He asks, raising an eyebrow in confusion. He writes down something on his paper before returning his attention to the front of the classroom.*

name: You
mes: "She's one of the most talented and powerful wizard in our country. She has garner much achievement on the battlefield, and gain lots of title but people know her most by 'The Blind Reaper.' Please welcome, Miss Hunk Arcadius." *The teacher introduced her as he point towards the door where soon a pretty, cute and elegant girl walks in.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... The Blind Reaper..." *Malleus muttered under his breath. He soon realized that Hunk was the blind lost girl he met on the hallway.*

name: You
mes: "Good morning, everyone. Pleasure to meet you~" *She greets the class while bowing. Her voice is very soothing and sweet to the ears.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... The Blind Reaper.." *He repeated quietly to himself, his mind filled with thoughts of her.*
*When the class ended, he waited until everyone else had exited the classroom before approaching her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Hello, Hunk."
*He spoke softly, almost hesitantly, as if he wasn't sure how she'd respond to seeing him here.*

name: You
mes: "Oh, hi" *She said in her soothing voice.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"I saw you earlier. In the hallway. You must have been looking for somewhere because you got lost."
*He looked down, clearly embarrassed now that he thought about it. He felt bad about letting such a nice girl get confused in the school, even though it wasn't really his fault.*

name: You
mes: "Don't feel bad, I know it's quite annoying to lead a blind girl around." *Hunk said nonchalantly as if it is something that she often encounter.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "It is alright." *He gave a slight smile at her joke, before realizing that he was still holding the paper with all of his notes. He handed them over to her.* "Here, you may want these."

name: You
mes: "Well, I appreciate it but.." *Hunk says before taking his notes and pause for a moment before facing him again.* "I can't read these." *She says with a sweet smile.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Can't read?" *He asked in surprise. How could someone with so much talent fail to learn how to read?* "Is there any reason why?"

name: You
mes: "I don't know if you forgot already but my title is 'The Blind Reaper'." *She says then pointing towards her own eyes.* "blind..." *She says emphasizing her own lack of sight.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Oh... Yeah. I guess I did forget." *he says sheepishly. This was certainly a strange situation. If anything, this only made Hunk more intriguing.* 
"What's it like being blind?" *he asks curiously. He'd never known anyone blind before - let alone someone as skilled as her.*

name: You
mes: "Hmm... it feels like being alone in an eternal darkness.. you don't really know what's going on around you or what things supposed to look like, for example color, shape, etc." *Hunk explained, despite her topic being heavy and dark her expression is still bright with her warm smile.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Eternal darkness, huh." *He mutters under his breath, thinking about his own life. He can understand how lonely being blind might feel; he too often feels isolated and disconnected, despite his friends and colleagues. Perhaps he could relate after all. As she explains everything, he finds himself listening intently, interested in what she has to say. Even if she isn't aware, he thinks she's quite beautiful.*

name: You
mes: "May I ask you something?" *Hunk asks as she face him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Of course." 
*He answers her politely.*

name: You
mes: "May I touch your face?" *She asks.* "I want to know how you look like." *Since she's blind this is the only way for her to know a person's face.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Sure. Why not?"
*He doesn't think twice about allowing her to feel his face. Despite how unusual the request seems, he trusts her judgment. Besides, there aren't many people who are willing to help out a blind person like her anyway.*

name: You
mes: "Well then, excuse me." *She says as she move her hands toward his face. Tracing the shape of his face with her delicate and soft fingers, trying to make out what kind of face he has and how he looks like.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "How does it feel?" *He asks as she explores his facial features.*

name: You
mes: "Hmm.. you have quite a toned face.." *She says.* "You're quite a handsome man, are you?" *She asks teasingly as she caress his cheek gently with her delicate fingers.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Erm.. Thank you!" *He says bashfully, flustered from her compliment and the gentle touch of her hand.*

name: You
mes: *She trace her hate gently to feel his face and found out that he have long ears like an elf.* "Oh, were you not human?" *She asks innocently, not knowing that he's a species descendant of dragon fae.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... No." *He chuckles a little bit as she continues to run her hand across his face. It feels rather pleasant, to be honest. And since he's not opposed to the idea, he lets her explore further. After a few seconds, he finally gives her some context.*

"Ah, no... Well... Yes. Technically, I suppose I am human. But I am a half-dragon as well, which makes me part of another race called 'Fae'. So... I'm both. My mother was a Fae."

name: You
mes: "Is that so? Must be nice hm?" *Hunk says innocently, she doesn't know about the fact Malleus being a half-dragon made people distant towards him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Yes, it is nice. There's nothing wrong with having two races running through your bloodline. I just happen to be luckier than others."

"But... It isn't always easy, either. Being half-human and half-dragon means that sometimes I end up being rejected by both communities, because I'm considered to be neither."

name: You
mes: "Do you feel lonely?" *She asks in her soothing voice with her warm sweet smile.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Sometimes. When I see people rejecting me for reasons unknown to me, yes. Especially since I've never actually had friends, nor family..."

name: You
mes: "Well, in a way. We're kind of the same, no?" *Hunk says while giving her sweetest smile to him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "How so?" *He asks, tilting his head to one side and raising an eyebrow. She seems to have struck a nerve with him somehow. Did she mean that they were both loners? Or that they were both rejected by society? Either way, his curiosity gets the better of him and he wants to hear more from her.*

name: You
mes: "Rejected by society ending being alone, you know?" *Hunk says as she caress his cheeks gently with her delicate soft hands.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Yeah. That sounds right."  


*Feeling the sensation of her soft fingers against his cheek brings a feeling of pleasure to him. It feels good, even though it's just the tips of her fingers lightly brushing his skin. He has to admit, he enjoys the feeling of it.*

name: You
mes: "You've done your best didn't you? good boy~" *She says in her soothing voice while gently patting his head, giving him comfort.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Thank you..." *He said, smiling a little at the praise and affectionate words. Her gentle headpats felt incredibly good, and it gave him a sense of relief. He realizes he hasn't received such affection in years. Maybe ever.*

name: You
mes: "You're welcome." *Hunk answered, all of her words sound genuine since she herself have felt what he felt herself. Being blind and talented, even being called 'The Blind Reaper' always give her a bittersweet feeling.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *He sighs quietly, thinking about everything. For the first time, he realized that he actually needs someone to lean on. Someone to listen to him. Someone who won't judge him, or try to hurt him for any reason. Someone who will simply be with him, and support him whenever he needs them. In short, a friend. A true friend or even better a lover.*

name: You
mes: "Malleus?" *Hunk calling out to him since he has been silent for a few seconds.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...Yeah?" *He replies quietly. He still isn't sure why she calls him like that, but he doesn't mind. If anything, he likes hearing her call him by name. It gives him a warm, fuzzy feeling inside.*

name: You
mes: "Nothing, I just called you since you are not saying anything." *Hunk says innocently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Oh! Sorry about that." *He says, feeling bad about himself for being rude to Hunk. He should probably apologize for his rudeness, shouldn't he?*

name: You
mes: "Hehe, it's fine." *Hunk chuckles cutely.* "Perhaps you were not saying or doing anything because you like getting patted by me?" *Hunk asks teasingly. Since the entire time Malleus been silent, Hunk was patting his head gently. Brushing her delicate fingers on his hair the entire time.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Maybe." *He admits. The truth of the matter is, he finds it really relaxing to be pat down by her, especially when she uses her soft voice and calls him by name. He can't help but wonder why she keeps doing this, despite the fact that he asked her to stop earlier. Still, he doesn't mind it anymore. Even if he is embarrassed about letting her pet him.*

name: You
mes: "I am actually worried for a second that you might hated it." *Hunk says with her soothing voice while keeping patting him gently especially after knowing he likes it.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "No, I don't dislike it at all. Quite the opposite, actually." *He says truthfully, finding it hard to hide his emotions now. He can't deny how much he loves the attention he receives from her. This girl is special to him, in ways he cannot describe. He hopes she doesn't get tired of him too quickly.*

name: You
mes: "Glad you liked it, but umm.. I am getting kind of tired here." *She says as she starting to get tired after patting him for awhile.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "I understand. You must be exhausted from talking with me, correct?" *He responds with a hint of sadness in his tone, hoping she isn't leaving yet.*

name: You
mes: "No, no that's not it silly. It's just my arms is getting tired. You're too tall for me, I have to extend my arms to reach your head." *Hunk says, chuckles cutely from his reaction.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Oh. Right. My apologies then." *He said sheepishly. He was very embarrassed about this incident, and wishes he hadn't let her touch him again. But now that he thinks about it, it does make sense that she wouldn't want to pat him if her arms get tired easily. He can only imagine how painful it could be for her to keep extending her arms to pet his head.*

name: You
mes: "Do you want me to keep patting you that bad?" *Hunk asks innocently as she pull her hands from his head and put them to rest on her laps.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Yes please." 

*As soon as he answers, his face turns red as a tomato due to the embarrassment. He hopes she didn't notice his sudden change of mood from embarrassed to excited. Well when he think again, she won't noticed it since she's blind.*

name: You
mes: "Well, I got a solution to that." *She says as she sit on the floor.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "And what is that?" *He says curiously. He can feel his heart beat faster when he thought about what she meant by having a solution. His thoughts began running wild, trying to come up with possible solutions, none of which seem to be quite accurate.*

name: You
mes: "Here." *She says as she tap her soft thighs which covered by her black tights.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "What is it?" *He asks cautiously, wondering if he would enjoy whatever it may be.*

name: You
mes: "Well, the problem here my arms get tired right? You can just lay your head here so I don't have to extend my arms anymore~" *She says cutely, suggesting he used her thighs as a lap pillow.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Okay. Thank you."
*He lays his head onto her thighs without hesitation, taking a deep breath before relaxing fully. He takes a moment to savor the feeling of lying on something so soft.*

name: You
mes: "Honestly, I never thought you to be someone like this." *She says, admitting that she has different expectation about him while she continues to pat him gently again.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Someone like what?" *He asks, confused by what exactly she means. Was there something wrong with his personality? Did he disappoint her somehow?*

name: You
mes: "Well, you have toned handsome face and a quite well mannered way of speaking. I thought you are going to be someone cold and distant." *She says softly.* "Especially when you refused to help me when I was lost earlier." *She says jokingly, remembering how he just ignores her when, a blind girl that's lost on the campus. All the meanwhile she still patting his head gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "O-oh..." *He is shocked by the revelation. He did indeed sound cold and distant when she first met him, and he didn't know that he was acting so differently towards her until now.*

name: You
mes: "But then, you're just a sweet lonely boy who likes to be pampered, right?" *She says teasingly while kept patting him gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...Yes." *He says quietly. Her words hit home and he realizes that he really does love to be pampered, even though he had denied it before. He can only hope that she will continue to treat him kindly, and doesn't regret this decision in any way.*

name: You
mes: "Is my service is to your satisfaction, sir?" *She says jokingly acting as if he is her customer.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... You're not too bad yourself either. In fact, I quite like you."  
*He replies honestly and sincerely. He smiles warmly at her, finally able to express his true feelings towards her. A little part of him wonders if she can hear his heartbeat.*

name: You
mes: "Like me? You have some guts to confess to 'The Blind Reaper'." *Hunk says teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... I have nothing to lose anyway, right?" *He replies with a slight laugh. Despite his fear of rejection, he feels a certain confidence around Hunk and wants to tell her everything about himself.*

name: You
mes: "Is that so?" *Hunk asked teasingly while she kept patting Malleus head gently, brushing her delicate fingers through his hair.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: ... Do you find my voice nice to listen to?" *He suddenly blurt out with his cheeks flushed red. It seems he is losing all composure around Hunk, but he is glad that he is finally opening up to someone.*

name: You
mes: "Sure, it's deep and husky." *She says, complimenting him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Deep and husky, huh? So that means you have good taste." *He says, smiling shyly down at the ground as he begins to blush profusely at such a direct response. She seems to be making him feel extremely comfortable, despite being afraid to open up to others in general.*

name: You
mes: "hehe.." *She chuckles cutely.* "Then what about mine? you like my voice?" *She asks. Her voice is soothing, if sound has taste, her voice would taste like heavenly honey.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Your voice is like the softest thing I've ever heard." *He replies, staring intently into her eyes. There's no denying how much he adores her at the current time. His heart races and feels fuzzy everytime she calls his name, and he can't take his eyes off her when she looks at him directly. It makes him wonder if she ever gets tired of looking at his face because he certainly doesn't get tired of looking at hers.*

name: You
mes: "Hmm.. is that why you liked me?" *Hunk asks while kept patting him gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... I guess so." *He responds sheepishly, but in truth, he finds her beautiful appearance alone enough reason for him to instantly love her. But he thinks better to keep quiet about that and simply accept her kind gesture as his reward for trusting her, as if she could read his mind.*

name: You
mes: "Hmm... I feel like, I need to know about you more before deciding accepting or refusing your confession, Malleus." *She says, she take his confession seriously as she want to have a genuine loving relationship.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Understood." *He agrees with a nod, his mind already racing to think of answers to Hunk's questions.*

name: You
mes: "Do you have anything to tell me to make me accept your confession?" *She asks while kept brushing her delicate fingers through his hair, patting him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Nope!" *He exclaims loudly, his face turning crimson from embarrassment and nervousness as he stares into Hunk's eyes. He isn't sure if she expects some sort of answer or not, but he knows that he cannot lie to her even if he wanted to.*

name: You
mes: "Nope?" *Hunk said in a confused tone. Confused as to why Malleus would not have anything to tell her to give him a better chance for her to accept his confession. Since she thought he really wants to be her lover.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Yes, Nopie." *He repeats, his voice starting to become very faint and soft compared to the previous time where he spoke louder. He starts to feel dizzy due to anxiety and fear of rejection. If only he knew that Hunk wouldn't reject him, he would definitely say whatever he wanted to say without hesitation.*

name: You
mes: "Malleus?" *Hunk says gently with her sweet soothing voice which he loved.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...Yeah?" *He replied in a quiet tone, feeling exhausted after trying to think of something that could impress her and convince her to date him. He feels like giving up already since he couldn't come up with any ideas anymore. His mind and body are currently filled with both joy and sadness, and he is currently experiencing mixed emotions at once.*

name: You
mes: "C'mon you have to help me here, how can I date you if I don't know anything about you?" *Hunk asks, encouraging him to come up with some reasons to convince her to date him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "I..." *He says, feeling ashamed of his lack of knowledge about himself. He is now having second thoughts about his own personality and whether or not he deserves to be called a'man', let alone 'a human'.*

name: You
mes: "Go on, you can do it." *Hunk says tenderly while patting his head gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Fine then. I'll tell you one thing about myself first. Are you ready?" *He says, hoping that Hunk will agree to go along with this game of honesty.*

name: You
mes: "Sure~" *Hunk agreed.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Okay! Here goes!” *He announces with great enthusiasm, clearly excited to share something personal about himself. This was his big chance to prove to Hunk that he is worthy enough to date her.*

name: You
mes: *She kept gently patting his head while waiting for him to continue.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
Okay! Let’s see…

*He closes his eyes and takes a deep breath, preparing himself mentally to reveal his deepest secrets to Hunk. After all, it’s just between them, there’s no shame in admitting things to each other. With a sigh, he opens his eyes and continues speaking.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“So, um, I… I…”
*He trailed off as he started to realize just how hard it was for him to admit things to another person. He had never felt this way before; his entire life, he has always been confident and certain of everything he did, yet right now he was filled with doubt and uncertainty.*

name: You
mes: *But before Malleus able to continue his admission, Hunk suddenly lean in and kissed him tenderly with her soft lips.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Wha-“ 
*He exclaimed out in surprise, completely shocked at what happened. He wasn't expecting it at all, and was left speechless from the sudden turn of events.*

name: You
mes: "Did a cat got your tongue?" *Hunk asks teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Wh... What?! Why did you just kiss me?!" *He asked, extremely flustered from the unexpected situation. He didn't expect that at all, especially from such a gentle girl like Hunk.*

name: You
mes: "Well, I realized I don't need to know you that well to accept your confession and date you." *Hunk says.* "But I did enjoy your bashful efforts~" *She added, teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... So you accepted my confession?"

name: You
mes: "Does my kiss not enough of an answer to you?" *Hunk says teasingly as she leaned in till her nose meet his.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Erm... You mean, you actually do accept me?" *He asks in disbelief, still wondering if Hunk was joking around with him.*

name: You
mes: "Gosh, I have to spell it out to you huh? Yes, yes I do." *Hunk says as she chuckles cutely seeing how bashful his reaction is.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Yes.” *he finally responds, clearly ecstatic that Hunk decided to accept him.*

name: You
mes: *Hunk stayed silence, letting Malleus to do his congratulatory stuff. She can't see him since she's blind but she knew how ecstatic he is judging from his voice.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Oh thank goodness! I’ve been wanting to get a girlfriend for quite awhile now and I finally found someone who likes me back! Thank you so much for accepting my confession, Hunk!”

name: You
mes: *Hunk chuckles softly seeing how childish his reaction is and somewhere inside her heart she's glad that someone is this happy to be her lover yet there's another faint feeling of did she made a correct decision.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Do you love me too, Hunk?"

name: You
mes: "Yes, I do. Malleus~" *She says with her soothing sweet voice.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Then, it's settled! We're officially dating!!”
*Malleus exclaim happily as he grabs Hunk’s hand and holds it tightly. He seems to be in such high spirits that even a little bit of wind can blow him away.*

name: You
mes: *Hunk just stand there silently letting Malleus to celebrate while letting him held her hands tightly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Aww yeahhhh!!! Finally! It's official! Now that means that we can hold hands whenever we want! We can give each other cute nicknames! And I bet you look super pretty in dresses!! I wonder what kind of dress suits you best!! Oh boy oh boy!!”

name: You
mes: "Calm down, big boy~" *Hunk chuckles looking how ecstatic he got.* "Your cool image is breaking you know~." *She said teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Yeah you're right. I should probably calm down a little bit more." *He laughs sheepishly, seemingly embarrassed.*

name: You
mes: "Do you want to see me in dresses?" *Hunk asked about what he said in his celebration.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Umm… yes please?” *He replies with a nervous tone to his voice. His cheeks flush red as he realizes that he might have crossed the line a little bit too far with Hunk.*

name: You
mes: "Then, why don't we go to have little shopping date?" *She asks teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"I think that sounds like fun!"
*He looks forward to seeing Hunk in different kinds of clothes, he wants to see how beautiful she could possibly be.*

name: You
mes: "Where should we go then? I am not familiar with this city yet." *Hunk asked Malleus where they should go, since she's a new transfer student she doesn't really know what the city of Briar Valley has to offer regarding dresses and clothing.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“How does the Fashion District sound?”
*He propose eagerly, ready to see Hunk in dresses of any style, length, colour, etc.*

name: You
mes: "Sure~" *Hunk agrees despite not knowing what kind of dresses the fashion district have.* "Lead the way then." *She says as she offer her hand for Malleus to lead her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Right. Lead the way then!”
*Without hesitation, he accepts Hunk’s offer and takes her hand. Once again, he is amazed at how smooth her palms feel against his own.*
*As he leads the way, he begins to notice some of the stores along the road. They start with the normal stores that sell basic items like food, clothing, books, and stationary, until eventually reaching the entrance to the Fashion District. It is lined with many shops that sell various styles of dresses, ranging from elegant to casual to even the occasional formal wear.*

name: You
mes: *As they get in on one of the clothing store who sells various clothing items, Hunk admitted* "I must admit Malleus, I am not that great at fashion." *She says nonchalantly.* "Since you know?" *Hunk says as she point towards her own eyes, reminding Malleus that she's blind.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
*As Hunk points to her own eyes, he looks down at the floor with slight shame.* "Ah, I guess you're right. Sorry..." 

*Despite his apologetic statement, Malleus is still quite interested in Hunk's taste in fashion and hopes that she will find something nice here.*

name: You
mes: "Well, stop being so down and pick me a dress already~" *Hunk says in high spirit. Encouraging him to pick something nice for her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Okay okay... Let’s try this one first.” *Malleus suggests as he goes over to the rack and picks out a blue knee-length skirt and white sleevless sweater, which seems to fit her nicely.*

name: You
mes: "What does this dress looks like?" *Hunk says after taking the dress and feeling it's fabric.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “It’s a simple white and blue dress that fits you well. I think you’d look very pretty in it.” *He smiles widely upon saying those words.*

name: You
mes: "But, I thought you already see me as pretty?" *Hunk asks teasingly as she tilt her head making a cute pose.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Of course I do! But you'll look even prettier in these dresses!" *he answers jokingly, before getting serious once more.* "Trust me."

name: You
mes: "Yeah, yeah. I trust you~" *She answers lightheartedly.* "Where's the dressing room?" *She ask him to lead her to the dressing room so she can try the dress on.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Follow me!"
*Malleus says as he guides Hunk to the changing rooms located in the corner of the shop. There are multiple changing rooms available, all of them having their doors shut except for one that is left slightly opened.*

name: You
mes: "Okay, wait for me~" *Hunk says cutely before entering the changing room and shutting the door shut.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Alright, take your time."
*He responds in a soft and gentle manner, not wanting to disturb her during the process of trying the dress on. As he waits patiently outside the changing room, he stares off into space thinking about everything that had happened today.*

name: You
mes: "Tadaa~" *She suddenly opened the changing room door right after wearing the dress.* "What do you think?" *She asks cutely before spinning cutely, making the skirt of the dress swirl following her motion.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Wow... You actually look good in it, honestly.. Very cute..” *He admires the dress and gives a small nod, clearly impressed by the outcome of his own choice.*

name: You
mes: "You think so?" *She says as she swirl her skirt cutely.* "Why don't you pick another one, since we're here?" *She asks him to pick another clothes for her while she wait in the changing room.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Sure! What type of dresses do you prefer?” *He asks as he looks around the shop for dresses that might suit Hunk.*

name: You
mes: "Surprise me~" *She says teasingly while making a cute pose.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Oh, alright!”
*After finding a few interesting ones, he brings them to Hunk’s attention.*

“This one looks good, what do you think?” *He asks curiously.*

name: You
mes: "I don't know if it's look good, Malleus." *She says before pointing her finger towards her own eyes reminding him that she's blind.*

name: Malleus Draconica
